title: E equals mc squared - electron mass energy

content.question: What is the equivalent energy of the mass of an electron?

choices.label: <math alttext="2.7 times 10 raised to the negative 22 power joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>22</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></math>

<math alttext="8.2 times 10 raised to the negative 14 power joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></math>

<math alttext="4.8 times 10 raised to the negative 11 power joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></math>

<math alttext="1.4 times 10 raised to the negative 2 power joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace></mrow></msup><mtext>J</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8.2 times 10 raised to the negative 14 power joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>J</mtext></math>
